name: Stereoscopic-Glitches: Origin
description: UHD 4K gif (3840x3840) for square displays & 3D glasses (red-cyan), by Tono C @toocabanelas. Stereoscopic-Glitches is a series of virtual experiments that mix cyber art with analog stereoscopy, the first immersive visual technology, already 170 years old. It is based on AV glitches that interact with real image loop developed with video game programming techniques, 3D scanning, AI and Deep Learning.
